General.Name: FinServ Acquisition Corp. II
General.Description: Finserv Acquisition Corp. II focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses in the FinTech and financial services industries. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 1345 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY, United States, 10105
